name: VENN (David Schmitt)
description:
The power of the Venn diagram is its ability to separate a collection into distinguishable groups. Use this ability to destroy as many blue orbs and avoid the red orbs.

Can you unleash the power of the VENN?

Post your high score in the chat and see how you compare.

Built for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Instructions for playing:

  1. Download the VENN.zip folder
  2. Extract the files
  3. Run VENN.exe
  4. If a popup displays from Windows Defender, select More Info and click Run Anyways
